chains.name: Onboarding - Spec to Tasks
chains.description: Translate Figma spec into actionable MASC tasks for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Design to Code Verify
chains.description: Generate HTML/CSS and verify visually (SSIM) for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Token Audit
chains.description: Audit design tokens and variables for consistency for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - A11y Audit
chains.description: Accessibility checklist + scan with remediation tasks for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Performance Budget
chains.description: Set and validate performance budgets for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Localization Pack
chains.description: Extract strings and prepare localization tasks for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Release Readiness
chains.description: Coverage + CI status with release risks for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Experiment Variant
chains.description: Propose variants and validate visual drift for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Incident UI Regression
chains.description: Map incident context to UI fixes for Onboarding (new user activation).

chains.name: Onboarding - Content Ops
chains.description: Copy/SEO checks and content updates for Onboarding (new user activation).
